description:
Since the day our law firm's doors first opened in Pennsylvania, we have worked to build a reputation for providing outstanding legal services. Today, the Wieand Law Firm has that very reputation, thanks to our dedication and commitment to client needs. If you live in Pennsylvania or neighboring New Jersey and need a personal injury attorney call us today.

We are proud to serve clients at four office locations, including Radnor, PA. When you call the Wieand Law Firm you will receive one-on-one attention from founding attorney Brent Wieand. He believes that victims of accidents and rights violations deserve individualized service of the highest quality in the aftermath of the following:

  • Motor vehicle accidents
  • Nursing home abuse and neglect claims
  • SEPTA bus and commercial trucking accidents
  • Medical malpractice
  • Slip-and-fall accidents
  • Defective product-related accidents
  • Work injuries

The Wieand Law Firm will fight diligently to see that justice prevails as your case moves through the legal system. Our goal is to keep you fully informed of the status of your claim at all times. To ensure our firm's services are available to all those in need, we offer a free initial consultation at our Radnor law office to all prospective clients.
